topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f56b006368725117170800#post_54f56b006368725117170800
Hey don't blame me! It says in my contract I must make a stupid joke every few hours or I don't get payed!

So I've been playing Dragon Ball Xenoverse all day and I must say. 

I haven't felt so Obligated to level up in a game in forever! Also do side missions as well!

Man I love this game! The only sad problem about this game is that I'm playing the PS3 version.

And I don't know if all the games are like this (I doubt it) but the PS3 version of this game *FRAME DROPS LIKE HELL.* 

Like, Oh my God! 

This game is certainly not running at 60 frames a second.
